title: swiftxi
author: swiftxi
created_time: May 22, 2023, 12:46:17 PMLast edit: May 23, 2023, 07:15:46 AM by swiftxi

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Mexc Global is a good exchange, but there are other exchanges that are having good services too. If it is no KYC exchange, there are still some too, like Kucoin. You make profit from trading, not because of the exchanges that you you are using. I will advice people not to trade with many altcoins because altcoins are like gambling. If they go in the direction that is not favouring you, it would be a big loss.

comments.author: swiftxi
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on May 22, 2023, 01:00:24 PMMexc Global is a good exchange, but there are other exchanges that are having good services too. If it is no KYC exchange, there are still some too, like Kucoin. You make profit from trading, not because of the exchanges that you you are using. I will advice people not to trade with many altcoins because altcoins are like gambling. If they go in the direction that is not favouring you, it would be a big loss.Im sorry but trading an altcoin gambling ? No I dont think so. Altcoins have made people millions $$, coinmarketcap reports daily volume of trades to 20.000.000$. Total marketcap is 1.1Trillion USD$ as of writing.Gambling is gambling my friend. Obviously HODLing a fresh altcoin is stupid as fck.bcs of instability and frequent large dumpsBut trading is a good thing overall.

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: @swiftxi, first of all, ref links in posts are prohibited, so edit the post and remove the link - and secondly, this topic is not suitable for this board - look for the move button and move the topic to -> Exchanges

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: swiftxi on May 22, 2023, 01:06:01 PMQuote from: Oshosondy on May 22, 2023, 01:00:24 PMMexc Global is a good exchange, but there are other exchanges that are having good services too. I will advice people not to trade with many altcoins because altcoins are like gambling. If they go in the direction that is not favouring you, it would be a big loss.Im sorry but trading an altcoin gambling ? No I dont think so. Altcoins have made people millions $$, coinmarketcap reports daily volume of trades to 20.000.000$. Total marketcap is 1.1Trillion USD$ as of writing.Gambling is gambling my friend. Obviously HODLing a fresh altcoin is stupid as fck.bcs of instability and frequent large dumpsBut trading is a good thing overall.Why Oshosondy mentions trading vs gambling is because of the fact that most coin market direction can not be predicted and if all things being equal one can not bet on any altcoin to take a particular direction during the trading session, so pick a trading position to become a gamble and base on high risk and luck since the price of the coin is the overall calculator of the profits or lose a trader will incur within a trading session. I was trading before but I stopped along the way due to continuous excessive losses.

If it is no KYC exchange, there are still some too, like Kucoin. You make profit from trading, not because of the exchanges that you you are using. I will advice people not to trade with many altcoins because altcoins are like gambling. If they go in the direction that is not favouring you, it would be a big loss.We can't do anything if there are still many of us here in this forum investing in altcoins especially meme coins, because let's face it there are not many who venture that they can get 100x -1000x the profit.       After all, we always tell most people to trade what they can afford to lose. Now if he is making profit from the strategy he is doing, he just repeats it until he gets a profit, that's how simple it is to understand.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on May 22, 2023, 01:00:24 PMMexc Global is a good exchange, but there are other exchanges that are having good services too. If it is no KYC exchange, there are still some too, like Kucoin. You make profit from trading, not because of the exchanges that you you are using. I will advice people not to trade with many altcoins because altcoins are like gambling. If they go in the direction that is not favouring you, it would be a big loss.Very correct there is no exchange that you trade in and get automatical profits from it, success in trading has to do with the level of knowledge from the trader and also good timing, also the availability of trading pair on the exchange for traders to trade. In terms of trading actually you can choose to go for decentralized exchange or centralized exchange it's all your choice, but I am always going to go for decentralized exchange to trade. Here is a list of centralized exchange and decentralized exchange you can carry out your trading activities.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2906237.msg29885570#msg29885570

In terms of trading actually you can choose to go for decentralized exchange or centralized exchange it's all your choice, but I am always going to go for decentralized exchange to trade. Here is a list of centralized exchange and decentralized exchange you can carry out your trading activities.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2906237.msg29885570#msg29885570the OP is lucky to turn his 70 bucks to 500 bucks. if i am him, better withdraw some of it just to make sure you covered your initial investments. because you'll never know if your strategy will work out every time. so as an assurance keep some for your future trading activities.mexc is known exchange so for now, he is quite safe to trade on this exchange. and i do agree, it is not about the exchange why he racked up those profits but his strategies to find those alts to trade with for nice profits. also, he is promoting his referral code so don't know the authenticity of his claim here. but if he really did get such profits, great! but this should not mislead other wannabe traders that they can get the same profits on this exchange.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: swiftxi on May 22, 2023, 01:06:01 PMIm sorry but trading an altcoin gambling ? No I dont think so. Altcoins have made people millions $$, coinmarketcap reports daily volume of trades to 20.000.000$. Trading an altcoins is not gambling per se if comparing it with visiting gambling sites and betting on casinos and matches, but people use to say it is gambling to let other people know how fast they can lose money because most altcoins are highly volatile.The meme coins that you mentioned, it is like you were just able to buy and the coins increased in price, not that you are actually good in trading and I will advice you to withdraw some of your money because I see you lucky because no good trader will advice anyone to be trading meme coins.
